Uses of Package
org.apache.lucene.benchmark.quality

Packages that use org.apache.lucene.benchmark.quality
org.apache.lucene.benchmark.quality Search Quality Benchmarking. 
org.apache.lucene.benchmark.quality.trec Utilities for Trec related quality benchmarking, feeding from Trec Topics and QRels inputs. 
org.apache.lucene.benchmark.quality.utils Miscellaneous utilities for search quality benchmarking: query parsing, submission reports. 
 

Classes in org.apache.lucene.benchmark.quality used by org.apache.lucene.benchmark.quality
Judge
          Judge if a document is relevant for a quality query.
QualityQuery
          A QualityQuery has an ID and some name-value pairs.
QualityQueryParser
          Parse a QualityQuery into a Lucene query.
QualityStats
          Results of quality benchmark run for a single query or for a set of queries.
QualityStats.RecallPoint
          A certain rank in which a relevant doc was found.
 

Classes in org.apache.lucene.benchmark.quality used by org.apache.lucene.benchmark.quality.trec
Judge
          Judge if a document is relevant for a quality query.
QualityQuery
          A QualityQuery has an ID and some name-value pairs.
